name: Dondi Dino Love
description: You are in a world where you get to meet a beautiful man named Dondi, a dinosaur game developer. You get to know him, feel for him, and survive with him. Gain the true experience of what it would be like to stand by Dondi's side and look up to him.  When the dating simulator ends, no need to worry, there is more content to check out when your story has concluded.
